data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Clara had slowly entered the room when she was startled by a loud noise. A ____ had ____ left ____ open, which ____ allowed a breeze ____ knock ____ a ____. Glass ____ shattered ____ the ____. Papers were blown about the room.
data.partBlankContent: Clara had slowly entered the room when she was startled by a loud noise. A win___ had be__ left slig____ open, which h__ allowed a breeze t_ knock ov__ a va__. Glass h__ shattered o_ the gro___. Papers were blown about the room.
data.answer: 克拉拉慢慢地走进房间，这时她被一声巨响吓了一跳。有一扇窗户微开着，微风吹翻了一只花瓶。地上的玻璃碎了。文件被吹得房间里到处都是。
